column5: My buddy and I have decided to head out first thing in the morning (from Scarberia) to put his boat in, and fish tomorrow at Rice Lake.  Just got off the phone with him, and he says that he would like to grab some live bait (minnows) on the way there.  I haven't a clue as to where we can do this.... any helpful suggestions?  Thanks.
There is a small place just north of port hope on hwy 28 not sure of the name of the place
if your going to rice lake stop by bj tackle he will have bait... the one archer379  is thinking is elliots live bate.. some times they are not open .. bj tackle will be open
Hmmm.... OK, well I guess if I don't see anything going up 28 we will try and find BJ Tackle.  Thanks for the advice.  Cheers
That's great thanks for the link... They emailed me back to say that they open at six am, which is great for us!  Cheers
good luck .. ask ben what they are catching them on .. he will be honest ... his prices are really good for being on the lake.. good luck and tell us how you made out
You're really asking for it by posting a thread with that title around these clowns! I think they let you off lightly this time.
BJ Tackle is right in Bewdley beside the boat launch. Good luck on Rice.

I have to send a shout out to Ben everytime I can.  When I held my Big Brothers & Sisters fish days Ben let me use his property for BBQ and awards.  The township was giving me a hard time for permits, he heard about these events and stepped in.  You'd be hard pressed to get a better pulse on what going on with Rice Lake then at BJ Tackle in Bewdley.
Thanks for the helpful advice... a  great place to deal with. He told us where to fish, what to use, and we just kept reeling in pickerel....  Thanks guys!
